text: Shinkō suru mono-tachi yo, akuma no ayumi ni shitagatte wa naranai. Anata gataga moshi akuma no ayumi ni shitagaunaraba, kare wa kanarazu shūkō to akuji o anata gata ni meijirudearou. Moshi anata gata ni taishi, arrā no onkei to jihi ga nakattanaraba, anata gata no naka ichi-ri mo junketsu ni narenakattadearou. Daga arrā wa, okokoro ni kanau mono o kiyome rareru. Arrā wa zen Akira ni shite zenchi de ara reru
